meanings.definition: Having experience, knowledge, or skill in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The seasoned chef effortlessly prepared a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: She sought advice from the seasoned hiker before starting the trail.
meanings.sent3: The seasoned detective quickly solved the mystery with a knowing smile.
meanings.sent4: His seasoned wisdom was a guiding light for the young students.
meanings.sent5: The seasoned sailor navigated the rough waters with ease.

meanings.definition: Flavored or treated with spices or herbs.
meanings.sent1: The seasoned chicken had a rich and aromatic taste.
meanings.sent2: The seasoned soup filled the kitchen with a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent3: The seasoned popcorn was a hit at the movie night.
meanings.sent4: The seasoned steak sizzled on the grill, tempting everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The seasoned curry was a perfect blend of flavors.

meanings.definition: Made mature or experienced through time and practice.
meanings.sent1: The seasoned musician played with skill beyond his years.
meanings.sent2: Her seasoned advice was always valued by her friends.
meanings.sent3: The seasoned athlete crossed the finish line with a triumphant grin.
meanings.sent4: The seasoned actor captivated the audience with every performance.
meanings.sent5: The seasoned teacher guided her students with patience and understanding.
